body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information. As part of the conversation, the customer should ask two questions.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should cover two or three topics, have back and forth between the parties, and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Sweet Delights Bakery! My name is Roger Barnes. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Sharon! Could you provide me with your email address and phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email is s.patterson@example.com and my phone number is five five five, three two one, four zero zero one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sharon. Is there anything specific you'd like to know about our bakery today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I was wondering if you offer custom cake designs for special occasions.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely, Sharon! We specialize in custom cakes for all occasions. Did you have a particular event in mind?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I'm planning a celebration for my five zero th birthday.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That's wonderful! We can create a beautiful custom cake for your celebration, Sharon. Thank you for considering Sweet Delights Bakery. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Have a fantastic day!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sharon. Is there anything specific you'd like to know about our bakery today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I was wondering if you offer vegan options for your pastries.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely, Sharon! We have a variety of vegan pastries available on our menu. Did you have your eye on a specific treat?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm interested in trying the vegan cupcakes. Do you have different flavors available?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Indeed, Sharon! Our vegan cupcakes come in flavors such as chocolate, vanilla, and lemon. You won't be disappointed. Thank you for your interest in our vegan options.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sharon, for your time and questions. We appreciate your support and look forward to serving you at Sweet Delights Bakery. Have a wonderful day!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Roger. I can't wait to try the vegan cupcakes. Have a great day too!
